title: Rebekah Vardy returns to Instagram as she marks her daughter's birthday
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Rebekah Vardy returned to Instagram after she went to war with Coleen Rooney .

The pregnant WAG, 37, has already got 49,000 new followers in the wake of the Wagatha Christie scandal, but appeared to ignore the obvious feud as she posted a series of adorable snaps.

The I'm A Celebrity star appeared to be totally focused on her family in her highly-anticipated social media return as she wished her daughter Sofia a happy fifth birthday with a candid post.

Sharing a series of sweet snaps from the moment Sofia was born to her life as an adorable little girl, Rebekah wrote: "Happy 5th Birthday to our Little Princess. We love you so much #familyiseverything".

(Image: Instagram)

Over the weekend, Coleen also broke her social media silence following the WAGs' infamous spat.

The 33-year-old broke her social media silence with a tweet. She posted: "Lovely morning in the fresh air with Cass.

"We had planned to be with the rest of our family in Barbados for half term break. Unfortunately I became poorly with an infection before we were due to leave."

She added: "I am not able to join them for the time being, even though I am feeling better."

(Image: Twitter)

As both ladies appeared to turn their focus to their families following their very public feud, their footballer other halves are seemingly staying as far away from the drama as possible.

While Coleen's husband Wayne has jet-setted to Barbados for a well-deserved holiday, Rebekah's husband Jamie has yet to speak out over the claims but chose to unfollow Wayne on Instagram.

Wayne Rooney 's wife accused Rebekah's Instagram account of leaking stories to a British tabloid, before going totally radio silent online.

(Image: Aaron Parfitt / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Getty Images)

The women recently went to war with an epic takedown that nearly broke the internet.

The nation watched in shock as Coleen exposed Rebekah's account and told her followers how she became suspicious of the fellow WAG and pinpointed the guilty account.

The saga began when Coleen made the revelation that someone close to her had been betraying her for years. She became suspicious when astories, that only her select followers could know about, were getting into the press.

(Image: Getty Images)

Coleen explained how she blocked all users apart from Vardy's account from seeing her social media stories, then purposely posted false information to see if it ended up in the press. The WAG then exposed Vardy's account as the culprit.

Vardy, who is pregnant with her fifth child, has vehemently denied all allegations and hired a cyber security expert to clear her name.

Fans couldn’t cope with the drama, with memes taking over the internet and #WAGathaChristie trending on Twitter .
description: Becky has made a comeback to Instagram as she shares a sweet birthday post with her new 49,000 followers after the 'WAG-atha Christie' scandal
